entry.title: [SQ] When one is a useless, defective parasite upon the body public, who provides not
entry.content: When one is a useless, defective parasite upon the body public, who provides nothing, contributes nothing, does nothing meaningful, and who (socially speaking) already practically doesn't exist, why should one bother suffering through 30+ years of increasing misery and futility, rather than just skipping to the inevitable conclusion now?
